msg: o add IT by Piotr for being able to use extensions with a reactor

author: jonesde
msg: Fixed bugs in recently refactored FreeMarkerWorker: a Reader was always being created even if the template was cached, also the reader was never closed which means files stayed open until the garbage collector cleaned up these objects which on busy production systems could lead to many thousands of open files
